overview:
Michael Hermus is the CTO of House Party, leading our development in Product, Technology, and Community.

Since joining House Party in January of 2011, Michael has leveraged our extensive expertise with Social Media and Consumer Marketing to improve our proprietary, market-leading engagement platform.

An experienced technologist with a strong background in operations and management, Michael’s expertise includes software development, information technology, business and product development, system operations and customer support.

Prior to House Party, Michael served as the CTO at FirstCarbon Solutions, where he directed product design, development and operations for the company’s large suite of sustainability software. In addition, he co-founded two software companies, Enverity Corp. and MarketXT, Inc., where he served as Chief Technology Officer.

Michael earned his B.S. and M.S. at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
